subject: News and News Media
Boxing
Television
lead_paragraph: Nichols, a reporter for CNN, and Beadle, who works for ESPN and HBO, posted on Twitter that they had been denied credentials to the fight between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao, though a promoter denied their claims.
snippet: Nichols, a reporter for CNN, and Beadle, who works for ESPN and HBO, posted on Twitter that they had been denied credentials to the fight between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao, though a promoter denied their claims.
